Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Parent-Teen Discovery is designed to break down boundaries and strengthen family ties by taking teens and their parents on a brand-new adventure at BYU-Idaho's Badger Creek Ranch.  By participating in a week-long series of family development workshops, exhilarating ropes courses, initiatives (Principle-based experiential learning), and a hand cart trek, this unique experience will give families the tools they need to communicate, work together, and build a stronger bond. Through fun, learning, and spiritual development, they will be inspired to reconnect, rediscover, and recommit to their relationship.

Cost

$250 per person

When: July 23-27

Parent Teen Discovery is for youth ages 14-18 and parent(s).

 

What to look forward to

  • Workshops for parents and teens
  • Ropes courses
  • Team building and initiative activities (Principle-based experiential learning)
  • Whitewater rafting
  • Family goal setting
  • Horseback riding
